lore: The Asura are an ancient tribe that lives and dies in battle. These creatures shook the foundations of human civilization a thousand years after the Watcher War.\n\nBefore entering battle, Asura Blooddrinkers perform a ritual that culminates with the sacrifice of a creature. For the next twenty-four hours, anyone who was present in the ritual can regenerate their wounds by feeding on the blood of their enemies.
menagerieDialog: Thank you for this opportunity. You won't regret this.
You lack the controlled anger that is necessary to overcome your enemies.
There is no room in this kingdom for weakness. With your permission, I would like to test your other creatures and determine their might.
Show no mercy. Never hesitate before you make a kill, lest your enemies will turn your pity to their advantage.
We're wasting time here. Let's keep moving. There are still plenty of enemies to defeat.
name: Asura Blooddrinker
